Reviews.Title: Fujifilm  F800EXR Review
Reviews.Author: ROE
Reviews.Content: This little camera has  me totally Blown away. It can take photos in total Darkness and the photos come out looking like it was taken on a bright sunny day.I am the kind of person that likes to learn as i go so i turn the dial  just to see what the F800EXR can do. I also like to photo wildlife, such as Ducks Geese Bobcats, Just about anything that moves. I set it to Advance the display says Advance filter then the very top  i highlight then press the ring to the right select Hi Key. press ok and raise the flash for the perfect Photo in total darkness.SP for scene position Since i like to shoot moving targets i use sport scene.You can use the EXR mode or the auto mode. There is a lot more i have not explored so i am looking forward to a lot of fun with this F800EXR. Can i recommend this camera to anyone else? I sure can!I hope you have as much fun as i am having.PS. make sure you order extra batteries for this camera. Such as the Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Charger for Fujifilm NP-50. Works extremely well with the F800EXR.

ProductInfo.Features:
A Japanese version.
Sips from Japan.
The display language supports Japanese and English.
Box,manual and software in Japanese.
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm F800EXR (RED) 16MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch TFT LCD,
